alert.note: Alert for Northern Elko County; Northern Lander County and Northern Eureka County; Ruby Mountains and East Humboldt Range; South Central Elko County; Southwest Elko County (Nevada) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 12 at 7:45AM PST by NWS Elko
info.description: ...Continuing snow showers across northeastern Nevada... A band of snow showers continues to impact portions of northeastern Nevada this morning. Showers will move southeast through the remainder of the morning affecting area roadways. Reductions in visibility and additional light accumulations of snow, generally less than one half inch are expected. Impacts will be mitigated as temperatures gradually warm through the morning, however, a few slick spots reamin possible on affected roadways, especially over passes. Snow showers dissipate through mid day with isolated light showers expected to linger across eastern Nevada this afternoon. Visit www.weather.gov/elko for the latest weather information.
